Class AdvancedDrawableTile

java.lang.Object
doerfer.preset.graphics.GElement
doerfer.preset.graphics.GGroup
doerfer.preset.graphics.DrawableTile
doerfer.AdvancedDrawableTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<doerfer.preset.graphics.GElement>
public class AdvancedDrawableTile extends doerfer.preset.graphics.DrawableTile
Class AdvancedDrawableTile Extends DrawableTile. Is used to get the AdvancedTile, the DrawableTile was made of
Author:
Jannis Fischer
